column2: "Ndwom mu ndwom a ɔyɛ Solomon dze."

column3: nkyɛ edze w'ano afew m'ano: Osiandɛ wo dɔ ye sen nsa."

column2: "Wo seradze yɛ huam papa; Wo ho nka tse dɛ eduhuam a woehue egu; Dɛm ntsi na mbaabun dɔ wo no."
"Twe me; ma yɛnyɛ no ntsɛm nkɔ: Ɔhen dze me aba ne mpia mu: Yebedzi ehurusi na hɛn enyi agye
column3: Mobɔbɔ wo dɔ dzin asen nsa: Ɔnnyɛ hu dɛ mbaabun dɔ wo."

column6: Na dɛ mbrɛ Solomon nkatahotam tse."

column3: osiandɛ ewia ahyew me ntsi. Emi na mbabanyin bo fuuw me
column4: Wɔdze me yɛɛ wenyin nture mu ɔhwɛfo; Na mbom mankasa mo wenyin ture no dze mannhwɛ."

column5: henfa na ema wɔhom ewiaber? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na menyɛ dɛ nyia wɔakata n'enyim Wɔ w'anyɛnkofo hɔn nguankuw nkyɛn?"

column7: Na nyɛn wo nguambaa wɔ nguanhwɛfo ntamadan no nkyɛn."

column3: medze wo ato Farao ne ntseaseanam ɔpɔnkɔ ho."
Wo kɔn yɛ fɛw wɔ ntweaban mu."

column2: "Yɛbɛyɛ sika edwindzi ndwowee ama wo a
"Aber a ɔhen tse no pon ho no
"Mo dɔfo yɛ eduhuam mɛɛr siaw dze ma me
"Mo dɔfo tse dɛ nhyiren siaw dze ma me Wɔ Engedi wenyin nture mu."

column4: wo ho yɛ fɛw; wo ho yɛ fɛw ae; W'enyiwamba tse dɛ ebubur dze."

column6: wo ho yɛ akɔndɔ: Hɛn dabew so yɛ efuw momon."

column2: "Hɛn dan no mpuna yɛ nkyindur ndua
column3: Na hɛn mpar so yɛ pepeaa."
